row.name__description: SR plugin which represents LUNs as VDIs sourced by hardware HBA adapters, e.g. hardware-based iSCSI or FC support
Base ISCSI SR driver, provides a LUN-per-VDI. Does not support creation of VDIs but accesses existing LUNs on a target.
